title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Transform digital experience: Accelerate AWS Partner & customer success(PEX208)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 转型数字体验：加速AWS合作伙伴与客户成功(PEX208)
abstract: Step into a dynamic space where customers and partner cloud transformations come to life. Whether you're starting your cloud journey with AWS or scaling your solutions, discover how the AWS Partner Network (APN), AWS Marketplace, and Specialized Solutions accelerate success. Partners can build, market, and sell solutions, while customers can quickly find validated expertise across cloud operations, security, data analytics, AI/ML, and Industries. Engage with interactive kiosks, genius bar, and demo stations, including our GenAI Gamechangers wall. Customers new to AWS can schedule 1:1 expert meetings, access hands-on labs, and discover technical resources to advance your cloud journey.
abstract_cn: 进入一个充满活力的空间，见证客户和合作伙伴的云转型之旅。无论您是刚开始使用 AWS 的云之旅，还是正在扩展您的解决方案，都可以了解 AWS 合作伙伴网络 (APN)、AWS Marketplace 和专业解决方案如何加速成功。合作伙伴可以构建、营销和销售解决方案，而客户可以快速找到涵盖云运营、安全、数据分析、AI/ML 和各行业的经过验证的专业知识。通过交互式信息亭、专家吧台和演示站进行互动，包括我们的 GenAI Gamechangers 展示墙。AWS 新客户可以预约一对一专家会议、访问动手实验室，并发现技术资源以推进您的云之旅。
